sentences.en: A list of phonetic symbols is given in the front of the dictionary.
sentences.cn: 在词典前面给出了音标表.

sentences.en: English phonetic teaching is an important teaching step in elementary stages.
sentences.cn: 语音教学是英语基础阶段重要的教学环节.

sentences.en: I thought a phonetic spelling might aid in pronunciation.
sentences.cn: 我想语音拼写可能有助于发音。

sentences.en: Including all Phonetic in GBK, Recognizing polyphonic words and creating new phrases.
sentences.cn: 包括GBK所有 汉字的拼音,可区分多音字, 可添加自定义词组.

sentences.en: Is the text marked with phonetic symbols?
Our department has engaged a foreign teacher as phonetic adviser.
sentences.cn: 我们系已经聘请了一位外籍老师作为语音顾问.
俄语的拼法是音形一致的.

sentences.en: Spelling is usually correct or reasonably phonetic of common words.
sentences.cn: 拼写大致上正确,或合理地使用语音共通字词.

sentences.en: The book with phonetic symbols, and other voice symbol table.
sentences.cn: 书后附有音标及其他语音符号表.

sentences.en: The transcription of words into phonetic symbols requires special training.
sentences.cn: 给单词注音标需要特殊的训练.

sentences.en: There are two kinds of puns, phonetic pun and semantic pun.
sentences.cn: 双关语分为谐音双关和语义双关两类.

sentences.en: These phonetic symbols represent sounds of the human voice.
sentences.cn: 这些音标表示人发出的声音.

sentences.en: Today, I learned a phonetic transcription 48, and a few words.
sentences.cn: 今天我学了48个音标, 和几个单词.

sentences.en: Tone sandhi as a common phonetic phenomena in Chinese dialect.
sentences.cn: 连读变调是汉语方言中一种普遍的语音现象.

words.tran_cn: 有声的，浊音的；声音的，语音的；声学的
音标符号；录音片；语音图；形声字
语音的，语音学的；音形一致的；发音有细微区别的

phrases.tran_cn: 国际音标；国际语音字母

trans.tran_cn: 语音的，语音学的，音形一致的，表示语音的
trans.tran_en: relating to the sounds of human speech
